DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study OC000459 Dosed Twice Daily 28 Days Asthmatic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria At Screening : Male female asthmatic , racial group . Females childbearing potential must practise two form contraception Non smoker Mild moderate asthmatic accord GINA guideline least 12 month . History asthma symptom increase response external allergen . Testing positive skin prick test allergen associate subject 's asthma Use inhale local corticosteroid period 28 day prior screen .
